Colorado_Springs.Ivywild, Colorado:
Ivywild, Colorado, is a subdivision of Colorado Springs south of the downtown, west of Cascade Avenue and along Cheyenne Creek. It is one of the city's oldest working-class neighborhoods.


== Early history ==
Before Europeans settled in the area, Cheyenne set up tepees at the confluence of the Fountain and Cheyenne Creeks when they traveled through the area.
